headline: KKR (NYSE:KKR) Plans US$300 Million Share Sale In JB Chemicals Stake Transaction
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) recently announced plans to sell up to $300 million worth of shares in J.B. Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Limited, representing a potential 10.2% stake in the company. This strategic move is part of their broader private equity engagements, also involving potential interests in Nestlé's water business and an impending acquisition of Japan’s Topcon Corporation. Amid these developments, the market experienced broader sell-offs, driven by inflation concerns and weaker consumer...

summary: U.S.-based private equityfirm KKR and Japanese state-backed fund Japan InvestmentCorp will acquire medical gear maker Topcon in atender offer buyout worth 348 billion yen , KKRsaid on Friday. ...
